page.title: 17FARMING IN OUR AREA 1
page.content: Hill of Eaton Farm is owned by Refuge Insurance of Manchester. Mr Boxall manages the farm. It is an Arable farm and the main crops are corn, barley, wheat, sugar beat and peas. The farm also has sheep and beef cattle and a lot of grassland.Two people are hired on the farm, including Mr Boxall. There are two tractors. Hill of Eaton farm is 390 acres. Mr Boxall also manages Overton Farm. The Refuge Insurance company own it. Overton farm is an arable farm. The main crops are wheat, corn, peas, barley and sugar beat. Mr Boxall has only two tractors. Two people work on the farm, that is including Mr Boxall. Overton Farm is 350 acres large. The 4 workers work at both farms.
